webSocket

Class WebsocketHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • webSocket.WebsocketHandler

  • public class WebsocketHandler
extends java.lang.Object
    Main class for WebSocket Handling. Some methods like @Onmessage, @onOpen etc. are automatically called from the Tyrus Thread created on connect. Other classes like MessageEncoder and MessageDecoder are also called automatically from the thread.
    See Also:
    MessageDecoder, MessageEncoder

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  WebsocketHandler.connectionResult 
      class  WebsocketHandler.PingTimer
      Ping thread scheduled every PING_INTERVAL_SECONDS interval.
